verbs.description: It [V: ’s] been exactly eighteen months since the election of Donald Trump , and not a day has gone by without mentioning Russian hacking or someone leaking classified information . The latest CBS ’s NCIS : New Orleans perfectly captures both issues with a little bit of obnoxious journalism to boot . If that ’s not the best way to capture 2018 , I do n’t know what is .
